channel.title: glasses on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in glasses on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-19
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to launch a self-driving EV in 2025 with a custom chip (3 minute read) Apple has reportedly accelerated its timeline for Project Titan, its secretive autonomous electric car project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-10
item.description: Amazon starts making its own TVs with new Fire TV Omni and 4-Series (4 minute read) Amazon has announced its Omni and 4-Series Amazon-branded 4K Fire TVs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-30
item.description: Facebook’s next hardware launch will be its Ray-Ban ‘smart glasses’ (2 minute read) Facebook’s next product release will be its Ray-Ban smart glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-20
item.description: Amazon focuses on another use for Alexa as Echo Frames smart glasses are now available (2 minute read) Amazon is moving its Echo Frames smart glasses from invite-only to general availability.
